tileentity.line: if(nbt['mID']==32013){return YELLOW+nbt['height']+GOLD+' 层'+ "\\n"+"§d最低-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+AQUA+standards((nbt['mFloor']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d当前-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+YELLOW+standards((nbt['mKeV']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d最高-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+RED+standards((nbt['mCeil']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV' }
if(nbt['mFluidMode']==1){return GOLD+'输出金液'} if(nbt['mFluidMode']==0){return WHITE+'输出面粉'}
if(nbt['batchMode']==1){return GREEN+'看看批'} if(nbt['batchMode']==0){return RED+'不给看批'}
if(nbt['mLockedToSingleRecipe']==1){return GREEN+'纯爱战士，启动！'} if(nbt['mLockedToSingleRecipe']==0){return GREEN+'牛头人狂喜！！！'}
if(nbt['wirelessMode']==1 && nbt['wirelessMode']!=undefined){return GREEN+'蓝波顿开无线，你就等着看烟花罢'} if(nbt['wirelessMode']==0 && nbt['wirelessMode']!=undefined){return GREEN+'杂鱼~杂鱼~无线都开不起的杂鱼~'}
if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==0){return RED+'无穷无尽的掉落物'} if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==1){return GREEN+'无穷无尽的LP'}
if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==0){return RED+'爷不想要奇怪的装备'} if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==1){return GREEN+'勇猛的榨精者会用装备填满你的AE'}

if(nbt['mFastMode']==0 && (nbt['mID']==31074||nbt['mID']==865||nbt['mID']==866)){return YELLOW+'低速16X'} if(nbt['mFastMode']==1 && (nbt['mID']==31074||nbt['mID']==865||nbt['mID']==866)){return YELLOW+'高速48X'}
if(nbt['chunkLoadingEnabled']==1){return GREEN+'开启'} if(nbt['chunkLoadingEnabled']==0){return RED+'关闭'}
var hatchcolor = ['黑色','红色','绿色','棕色','蓝色','紫色','青色','淡灰','灰色','粉色','黄绿','黄色','淡蓝','品红','橙色','白色']; if(nbt['mColor']>0){return YELLOW+hatchcolor[nbt['mColor']-1]}
if(nbt['autoStock']==1) {return GREEN+'获得AE的全部力量！'} if(nbt['autoStock']==0) {return GREE+'手动标记所需的物品'}
if(nbt['autoPull']==1) {return GREEN+'获得AE的全部力量！'} if(nbt['autoPull']==0) {return GREE+'手动标记所需的流体'}
if(nbt['additionalConnection']==1) {return GREEN+'可以从别的面连接'} if(nbt['additionalConnection']==0) {return GREEN+'不能从别的面连接'}
if (nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputanimationsEnabled']==0){return GREEN+"拯救TPS"} if (nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputanimationsEnabled']==1){return GREEN+"好看的星系"}
AAeoh=nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputastralArrayAmount']; if (nbt['mID']==15410 && AAeoh!=0){return LPURPLE+" 数 "+YELLOW+standards(AAeoh)+LPURPLE+" 量 "}
PAeoh=nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputparallelAmount']; if (nbt['mID']==15410 && PAeoh!=0 && AAeoh!=0){return LPURPLE+" 并 "+YELLOW+standards(PAeoh)+LPURPLE+" 行 "}
if (nbt['mActive']==0 && (nbt['mID']==31150 || nbt['mID']==810)){return DGRAY+"摸鱼中"} if (nbt['mActive']==1 && (nbt['mID']==31150 || nbt['mID']==810)){return GOLD+"炖屎中"}

if (nbt['mActive']==0 && (nbt['mID']==31150 || nbt['mID']==810)){return ALIGNCENTER+GOLD+"摸鱼----§m§o倪哥快乐§6"} if (nbt['mActive']==1 && (nbt['mID']==31150 || nbt['mID']==810)){return ALIGNCENTER+GOLD+"炖屎----永无止境"}
var Gent=['遏制','终极遏制','粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']>=0 && (nbt['mID']==19010||nbt['mID']==19012)){return GOLD+Gent[nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']-1]}
var fusionCoil = ['超导线圈','压缩聚变','进阶压缩聚变','MK-II原型','MK-II','进阶高能线圈']; if (nbt['mID']==19046 && nbt['compactFusionCoilTier']>0){return fusionCoil[nbt['compactFusionCoilTier']-1]}
var Gent=['粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['tierStabilisationField']>=2 && nbt['mID']==19015){return GOLD+Gent[nbt['tierStabilisationField']-2]}
var Gent=['粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['tierDimensionField']>=2 && nbt['mID']==19015){return GOLD+Gent[nbt['tierDimensionField']-2]}
var Gent=['粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['tierTimeField']>=2 && nbt['mID']==19015){return GOLD+Gent[nbt['tierTimeField']-2]}

if(nbt['mEUt']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mWrench']==0 || nbt['mScrewdriver']==0 || nbt['mSoftHammer']==0 || nbt['mHardHammer']==0 || nbt['mSolderingTool']==0 || nbt['mCrowbar']==0){return YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt'])*1.1+GOLD+" EU/t"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1154) if(nbt['superheated']==0){return GREEN+"蒸汽: "+YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt']) * 2+YELLOW+" mB/t"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1154) if(nbt['superheated']==1){return GREEN+"过热蒸汽: "+YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt'])+WHITE+" mB/t"}

if(nbt['mEfficiency']!=0)if(nbt['mEfficiency']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1131 || nbt['mID']==865 || nbt['mID']==866 || nbt['mID']==1151 || nbt['mID']==1152 || nbt['mID']==1153){return YELLOW+((nbt['mEfficiency']) / 100).toFixed(0)+WHITE+" %"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1020 || nbt['mID']==1021 || nbt['mID']==1022 || nbt['mID']==1023){return YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt']) * 2+WHITE+" mB/t"}
if(nbt['mWrench']==0 || nbt['mScrewdriver']==0 || nbt['mSoftHammer']==0 || nbt['mHardHammer']==0 || nbt['mSolderingTool']==0 || nbt['mCrowbar']==0 || nbt['eCertainS']>0){ return RED+"xx 需要维护 xx"}
if (nbt['mOutputFluid']==1){return GREEN+'开启'} if (nbt['mOutputFluid']==0){return RED+'关闭'}

var ampereToId = {"3A": [1320, 1326, 1420, 1426, 1500, 1506, 1540, 1546, 1660, 1666, 1900, 1906]}; var idToAmpere = {}; for (var i in ampereToId) {for (var j in ampereToId[i]) {idToAmpere[ampereToId[i][j]] = i;}} return idToAmpere[nbt['mID']];

var ampereToId = {"6A": [1321, 1327, 1421, 1427, 1501, 1507, 1541, 1547, 1661, 1667, 1901, 1907]}; var idToAmpere = {}; for (var i in ampereToId) {for (var j in ampereToId[i]) {idToAmpere[ampereToId[i][j]] = i;}} return idToAmpere[nbt['mID']];

var ampereToId = {"36A": [1324, 1330, 1424, 1430, 1504, 1510, 1544, 1550, 1664, 1670, 1904, 1910]}; var idToAmpere = {}; for (var i in ampereToId) {for (var j in ampereToId[i]) {idToAmpere[ampereToId[i][j]] = i;}} return idToAmpere[nbt['mID']];

var ampereToId = {"96A": [2404, 2424, 2504, 2510, 11334, 11340, 2523, 2529, 2603]}; var idToAmpere = {}; for (var i in ampereToId) {for (var j in ampereToId[i]) {idToAmpere[ampereToId[i][j]] = i;}} return idToAmpere[nbt['mID']];

var ampereToId = {"128A": [2405, 2425, 2505, 2511, 11335, 11341, 2443, 2023]}; var idToAmpere = {}; for (var i in ampereToId) {for (var j in ampereToId[i]) {idToAmpere[ampereToId[i][j]] = i;}} return idToAmpere[nbt['mID']];
